segments.text: I see a woman drying dishes at the sink, completely absorbed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has no idea that the water is overflowing, creating a puddle at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how she can be so unaware of the chaos unfolding around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are sneaking cookies, their excitement palpable as they scheme.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is precariously balanced on that rickety stool, reaching into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I canâ€™t help but feel a rush of adrenaline watching him stretch so far.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands ready, her hand raised, waiting for her treat, completely trusting him.
segments.speaker: PAR
